name: tender-api
description: Interact with Tender App backend APIs for construction tender management

skills.name: tender-api
skills.description: Interact with Tender App backend APIs for construction tender management. Actions: global search (projects/packages/submissions/contractors), evaluate documents with AI, query price history with RAG, compare Excel files. Use when user asks to find/search/list projects, packages, submissions, contractors, or needs tender evaluation, price intelligence, document comparison.

commands.name: tender-search
commands.description: Quick search across Tender App entities
